mapper.insert: insert into `PMS_BindApply` (serverId, userId, wxNickname, openId, status, operator, applyDate, reviewDate, userCode) values (#{serverId}, #{userId}, #{wxNickname}, #{openId}, #{status}, #{operator}, #{applyDate}, #{reviewDate}, #{userCode})
mapper.select: select * from `PMS_BindApply` where serverId = #{serverId} and userCode = #{userCode} and status != 3;
mapper.update: update `PMS_BindApply` set status = 1, reviewDate = now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select bindApply.*, userInfo.userId as userCode, server.serverName, customer.customerName from `PMS_BindApply` bindApply left join `PMS_Server` server on bindApply.serverId = server.id left join `PMS_Customer` customer on server.customerId = customer.id left join `PMS_UserInfo` userInfo on bindApply.userId = userInfo.id
mapper.update: update `PMS_BindApply` set status = 3 where serverId=#{serverId} and userCode=#{userCode}
update `PMS_BindApply` set status = 1, reviewDate = now(), userId = #{userId}, userCode = #{userCode} where id=#{id}
